doc.title: News quiz: the news from Rome
doc.author: Abhinav Ramnarayan
doc.description: Have you been keeping up with current affairs in Italy?

main.p: This article is more than 15 years oldNews quiz: the news from RomeThis article is more than 15 years oldAs Silvio Berlusconi receives a visit from the Libyan leader, Muammar Gaddafi, test your knowledge of current affairs in Italy1.Gaddafi arrived in Rome bearing a picture of Omar Mukhtar, causing his host some embarassment. Who is Mukhtar?A former diplomat assassinated in Italy by extremistsA resistance leader killed by Italian colonistsA human rights activistA refugee who died in an Italian campReveal2.Gadaffi is to meet 700 Italian women from the world of politics, industry and culture as part of the visit Where did he last hold a similar meeting in Europe?ParisLondonGenevaKrakowReveal3.Berlusconi’s wife, Veronica Lario, recently asked for a divorce. What triggered her decision?The publication of pictures of topless women at his villaHis visit to an 18-year-old’s birthday partyHis appointment of the former topless model Mara Carfagna to the Italian cabinetHis decision to send back boatloads of Libyan refugeesReveal4.Which newspaper recently published photographs of topless guests in Berlusconi’s holiday villa?La RepubblicaEl PaisLe MondeThe SunReveal5.Berlusconi is also president of a football club.
